TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UserTrackingLocationCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.List`1<class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>
Public Class UserTrackingLocationCollection Inherits List(Of UserTrackingLocation)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
Un elemento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> gestisce due oggetti: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection>: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> specifica parametri utilizzati per accoppiare eventi di stato dell'attività e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> specifica parametri utilizzati per escludere eventi di stato dell'attività dalla corrispondenza.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection> viene inizializzata per contenere gli oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> specificati in `locations`.
